name: Torn Between
description:
Torn Between (2017)

Torn Between that takes ideas and references from the 2013 idea Torn Between, only this time it has been done right. Originally the story was supposed to have been a full musical but features a little ditty. You can find out more in the link below.

Link:

https://2dpixelworld.blogspot.com/2017/09/torn-between-2017.html

Credits:

B.M (Writer/Animator/Character Design)

Rina Mizura Adachi as Gigi, Lemon and Pepper

CaptainBatBrain as Mint

Enterbrain (Software)

Music:

"Oh, My Dear!" performed by Rina Adachi
